Method Detail

getMetadataReader

public static MetadataReader getMetadataReader(java.lang.String filename)
Retrieve a metadata reader suitable for the given filename.

Parameters:
filename - The filename of the song to create a reader for.
Returns:
A MetadataReader which can be queried for metadata concerning the given song. If there are no suitable metadata readers available, a NullMetadataReader will be returned.
